item.description:
At this steering meeting we will discuss the future, format, management, promotion and settings for the group.

The meeting is open to all group members. If you've got suggestions or want to help steer the group's direction - join us!

DIRECTIONS

Take the T to Park Street. Cross Tremont Street towards Finagle a Bagle, which is on the corner of Winter Street. Continue down Winter Street halfway and turn right (after Sovereign Bank) onto Winter Place. The entrance to 30 Winter Street is on Winter Place. Take elevator to 8th floor.

If driving mapquest directions to 30 Winter Street. Meters are free after 6pm - leave time to circle for one. Another option is to park under the Boston Common in the garage and walk over. Just exit towards Tremont and follow directions above from the Park Street T stop.
item.name: Boston Meetup Organizer Meetup Steering Committee
